comments_since_last_sample.body: This president is trying to take us all down is anybody going to stand Up

Ask the British,  who in 1900, was the greatest empire in the history of the world.   The saying, “ that the sun never sets on the British Empire” was true.   Twenty five percent of the world’s population were its subjects.    Fifty years later, it was gone.   Today, the British people will tell you that they are no longer a world power.   Wars, run away spending, weak government and a turn to socialism led to the down turn.   Venezuela was the richest country in the Southern Hemisphere 15 years ago.   Today, it is the poorest under a socialist government.   You are fools if you think it can’t happen to us.    Joe Biden will take this country down if we don’t stand up to this radical left agenda.
"Most popular president in US history", my a**.
No Republican should be Allowed to Benefit from our bill. Free Child care, college, elderly care, Child tax credit Only for Democrats.
Remember these are the same people who said Nothing when we were Wasting $300 Million per day for 20 Years straight. Are voters that Stupid
